short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist time tracker that works offline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hours is a minimalist time tracker that can be used to keep track of multiple items at the same time. 

To create a new tracker you just need to give it a name and press enter! Trackers can be paused, resetted and deleted with a click. 

It works offline and doesn't require any login.

------------------------

If you have any question or suggestion you can contact me at matteopagliazzi@gmail.com, I'll be happy to answer your emails

The project is open source and can be found on Github at https://github.com/paglias/hours
